ygData.subject: Re: Looking for spellcomponents
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Personal statistics from Borer and Scythe beetles in north Karan (out of three days of killings): - 3 pages - 2 words (from Mythiran s list, one necro and
ygData.messageBody:
According to Michael Ott:
> it just depends on how ard and where you look... mpostly these items will
> com off of lev 16+ critters so keep killing them and if you fiond some that
> give words and such keep killing them they should be on the same random
> table as the runes...

Personal statistics from Borer and Scythe beetles in north Karan
(out of three days of killings):
- 3 pages
- 2 words (from Mythiran's list, one necro and one magician)
- 2 runes

So I have a pretty good distribution.
It is purely random, but the level of the mobs is important; I found only
components for level 16 spells.
